attributes.action: Abandon the policy of local Doctors surgery closures.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This governments policy of closing essential local Doctors surgeries, is detrimental to local communities. With little or no local transport infrastructure, some sections of the community will suffer. It is already difficult to obtain an appointment with the local surgery, let alone have to queue up behind thousands of other needy people after a long journey.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
